com.pks.names.extension.pojo
Interface InameList

All Known Implementing Classes:
BankNameList, NameList
public interface InameList

InameList defines the interface for a list that is intended to specifically deal with names names can be either peoples names or the names of "things"

Method Detail

acceptableMatch

boolean acceptableMatch(InameList nl)

equals

boolean equals(InameList nl)
an equality test between name lists. This performs only basic one to one tests of the lists and requires full matching of the words

Parameters:
nl - the name list against which to compare
Returns:
true if they are the same, false if they differ

getNameWithoutSpaces

java.lang.String getNameWithoutSpaces()
A utility function to return all the names concatenated without spaces

Returns:

getWord

WordInName getWord(int index)
Obtains a word from the name in a particular location. The first word is in location 0

Parameters:
index -
Returns:
a WordInName instance or null if thee is no name

firstToLast

void firstToLast()
FirstToLast moves the first word in the name into the final position and moves all the others up one position. It is intended to be used when names are represented surname first. For example "Smith, John Paul" will convert to "John Paul Smith"

getLastWord

java.lang.String getLastWord()
Obtain the last word in the name

Returns:
the last word as a string

getFirstWord

java.lang.String getFirstWord()
Obtain the first word in a name

Returns:
the first word as a string or null

length

int length()
Return the length of the list, that is the number of words in the name

Returns:
an integer representing the count of words in the name
